Airplane!

Rank: 57


After the crew becomes sick with food poisoning- a neurotic ex-fighter pilot must safely land a commercial airplane full of passengers.


Director: Jim Abrahams

Writer: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker

Stars: Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Leslie Nielsen

Tags: Dark Comedy, Farce, Parody, Satire, Slapstick, Comedy
